name: Monolith (itch) (202-N Stuidios)
description:
Defend yourself!

As a Praetorian guard, it is your duty to defend the Monolith against any and all who would threaten their existence. In 2093, Monoliths are alien energy crystals that power whole cities, and if they were to be destroyed than all power would be lost. You have been supplied with experimental weapons designed with Monolith energy technology. Brace yourself, a drone army has entered the city and are slaughtering thousands. Choose from a variety of mythological based weapons to aid you against this mysterious force. Use their technology against them and upgrade your weapons for even more devastating power. Hold your position, if you fall so does the city.

Features
  • Choose from a variety of weapons with unique abilities and playstyles
  • Enjoy an immersive environment of a sci-fi world
  • Defend against waves of enemies with different weaknesses and combat abilities
  • Help your other Praetorians and divert energy to districts in need
  • All of this and more in this fun action-packed VR game!
